Kamal Ahmed wrote:

> Does anyone have experience on testing Portlets using JUnit?
> Any suggestion would be welcome.

I haven't done portlets in particular, but I've heard they're a lot like 
servlets. In that case, _JUnit Recipes_ has a chapter on testing web 
components, and the recipes that apply to servlets should apply pretty 
well to portlets.

Take care.
